# [3 — Documentation, Testing & Validation]{.hidden}{data-autoslide="18000"}

[3]{.f2 .ph3 .br2 .white .bg-dark-pink .smallcaps} — [Documentation, Testing & Validation]{.f2 .b}

ValidMind also enables validation of models through [independent review]{.highlight .b} and [process verification]{.highlight .b} that meet strict policies and regulations.

:::

# [4 — Ongoing monitoring]{.hidden}{data-autoslide="6000"}

[4]{.f2 .ph3 .br2 .white .bg-dark-pink .smallcaps} — [Ongoing monitoring]{.f2 .b}

<hr>

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%" .f3 .pr4 .pt2}
**Regulatory expectations:**

> _Conduct ongoing monitoring of models to ensure they remain accurate, reliable, and appropriate for their intended use, with results feeding into governance, escalation, and remediation processes._
:::

::: {.column width="60%" .f2 .pl2 .pr2}

ValidMind provides [ongoing monitoring]{.highlight .b} to ensure models are performing as expected and to detect potential issues early.

Combine monitoring and workflows for [performance-based governance]{.highlight .b}, including scheduled revalidation cycles, event-triggered reassessments, and escalation to risk functions and committees.
:::

::::

# [5 — Reporting]{.hidden}{data-autoslide="6000"}

[5]{.f2 .ph3 .br2 .white .bg-dark-pink .smallcaps} — [Reporting]{.f2 .b}

<hr>

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%" .f3 .pr4 .pt2}
**Regulatory expectations:**

> _Provide comprehensive reporting and analytics to support model risk management decisions._
:::

::: {.column width="60%" .f4 .pl2 .pr2}
ValidMind streamlines reporting across governance, documentation, and validation with [customizable dashboards]{.highlight .b}, exportable governance artifacts, and first- and second-line reports. Built-in version control captures model activity for full audit trails.

ValidMind streamlines reporting across governance, documentation, and validation with [customizable dashboards]{.highlight .b}, exportable governance artifacts, and first- and second-line reports. Built-in version control captures model activity for full audit trails.

ValidMind provides reporting for compliance review governance, compliance, and model validation. Features include customizable dashboards, model and findings tracking, exportable governance and monitoring reports, and audit trails to support regulatory requirements.
